titleStmt.title: Of the great treason and syege of Andwerpe that was in July last past by Marten of Rossen which came forth of Gelderlande with xiiii.M. men of armes.
Of the great treason and syege of Andwerpe that was in July last past by Marten of Rossen which came forth of Gelderlande with xiiii.M. men of armes.

publicationStmt.publisher: In saynt Pulchres parysh in the Old Bayly, by Rychard Lant,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from STC; publication date conjectured by STC (Rossem's invasion of Belgium took place in 1542).
Imperfect: a fragment; consists of 4 leaves, mostly mutilated.
Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and the John Ryland University Library, Manchester, England.
Appears at reel 641 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy), and at reel 1862 (John Ryland University Library copy).
